 8134: otp16649(N, Config) ->
 8135:     ?IPRINT("otp16649 -> entry with"
 8136:             "~n   N:      ~w"
 8137:             "~n   Config: ~p", [N, Config]),
 8138: 
 8139:     AgentNode   = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 8140:     ManagerNode = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 8141: 
 8142:     AInfo = rpc:call(AgentNode, snmpa, info, []),
 8143: 
 8144:     ?IPRINT("Agent Info: "
 8145:             "~n      ~p", [AInfo]),
 8146: 
 8147:     {value, {_, AgentRawTransports}} =
 8148:         lists:keysearch(agent_raw_transports, 1, Config),
 8149:     {value, {_, NetIF}}                =
 8150:         lists:keysearch(net_if, 1, AInfo),
 8151:     {value, {_, TIs}}                =
 8152:         lists:keysearch(transport_info, 1, NetIF),
 8153:     
 8154:     if (length(AgentRawTransports) =:= length(TIs)) ->
 8155:             ok;
 8156:        true ->
 8157:             ?IPRINT("Invalid transports: "
 8158:                     "~n   Number of raw transports: ~w"
 8159:                     "~n   Number of transports:     ~w",
 8160:                     [length(AgentRawTransports), length(TIs)]),
 8161:             exit({invalid_num_transports,
 8162:                   length(AgentRawTransports), length(TIs)})
 8163:     end,
 8164: 
 8165:     ?IPRINT("validate transports"),
 8166:     otp16649_validate_transports(AgentRawTransports, TIs),
 8167: 
 8168:     ?IPRINT("which req-responder port-no"),
 8169:     AgentReqPortNo = otp16649_which_req_port_no(TIs),
 8170: 
 8171:     ?IPRINT("which trap-sender port-no"),
 8172:     AgentTrapPortNo = otp16649_which_trap_port_no(TIs),
 8173: 
 8174:     ?IPRINT("(mgr) register user"),
 8175:     ok = otp16649_mgr_reg_user(ManagerNode),
 8176: 
 8177:     ?IPRINT("(mgr) register agent"),
 8178:     TargetBase = "otp16649-agent-",
 8179:     ReqTarget  = TargetBase ++ "req",
 8180:     TrapTarget = TargetBase ++ "trap",
 8181: 
 8182:     ok = otp16649_mgr_reg_agent(ManagerNode,
 8183:                                       ?config(ipfamily, Config),
 8184:                                       ?config(tdomain, Config),
 8185:                                       ReqTarget, AgentReqPortNo),
 8186:     ok = otp16649_mgr_reg_agent(ManagerNode,
 8187:                                       ?config(ipfamily, Config),
 8188:                                       ?config(tdomain, Config),
 8189:                                       TrapTarget, AgentTrapPortNo),
 8190: 
 8191:     ?IPRINT("(mgr) simple (sync) get request"),
 8192:     Oids     = [?sysObjectID_instance, ?sysDescr_instance, ?sysUpTime_instance],
 8193:     ok = case otp16649_mgr_get_req(ManagerNode, Oids) of
 8194:                    {ok, {noError, 0, ReplyOids}, _} ->
 8195:                        ?IPRINT("(mgr) simple (sync) successful reply: "
 8196:                                "~n      ~p", [ReplyOids]),
 8197:                        ok;
 8198:                    {ok, InvalidReply, _} ->
 8199:                        ?IPRINT("(mgr) simple (sync) invalid reply: "
 8200:                                "~n      ~p", [InvalidReply]),
 8201:                        ok;
 8202:                    {error, Reason} ->
 8203:                        ?IPRINT("(mgr) simple (sync) error: "
 8204:                                "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 8205:                        error
 8206:                end,
 8207: 
 8208:     ?IPRINT("load TestTrap..."), 
 8209:     MibDir = ?config(mib_dir, Config),
 8210:     ok = otp16649_agent_load_mib(AgentNode, MibDir, "TestTrap"),
 8211: 
 8212:     ?IPRINT("(agent) send trap (testTrap2)"),
 8213:     ok = otp16649_agent_send_trap(AgentNode, testTrap2),
 8214: 
 8215:     TDomain = ?config(tdomain, Config),
 8216: 
 8217:     receive
 8218:         {handle_trap, From_v1, TrapTarget,
 8219:          {?system, 6, 1, _, Vbs_v1}}
 8220:         when is_pid(From_v1) andalso
 8221:              is_list(Vbs_v1) andalso
 8222:              (TDomain =:= transportDomainUdpIpv4) ->
 8223:             ?IPRINT("received expected (v1) handle trap callback message: "
 8224:                     "~n      ~p", [Vbs_v1]),
 8225:             ok
 8226: 
 8227:     after 5000 ->
 8228:             case TDomain of
 8229:                 transportDomainUdpIpv4 ->
 8230:                     ?IPRINT("TIMEOUT"),
 8231:                     exit(timeout);
 8232:                 transportDomainUdpIpv6 ->
 8233:                     ?IPRINT("expected timeout - "
 8234:                             "v1 trap's can only be sent on IPv4 domains"),
 8235:                     ok
 8236:             end
 8237:     end,
 8238: 
 8239: 
 8240:     ?IPRINT("load TestTrapv2..."), 
 8241:     ok = otp16649_agent_load_mib(AgentNode, MibDir, "TestTrapv2"),
 8242: 
 8243:     ?IPRINT("(agent) send trap (testTrapv22)"),
 8244:     ok = otp16649_agent_send_trap(AgentNode, testTrapv22),
 8245: 
 8246:     receive
 8247:         {handle_trap, From_v2, TrapTarget,
 8248:          {noError, 0, Vbs_v2}} when is_pid(From_v2) andalso
 8249:                                     is_list(Vbs_v2) ->
 8250:             ?IPRINT("received expected (v2) handle trap callback message: "
 8251:                     "~n      ~p", [Vbs_v2]),
 8252:             ok
 8253: 
 8254:     after 5000 ->
 8255:             ?IPRINT("TIMEOUT"),
 8256:             exit(timeout)
 8257:     end,
 8258: 
 8259:     ?IPRINT("done"),
 8260:     ok.
 8261: 
 8262: 
 8263: otp16649_init(N, AgentPreTransports, Config) ->
 8264:     ?IPRINT("otp16649_init -> entry with"
 8265:             "~n   N:                  ~w"
 8266:             "~n   AgentPreTransports: ~w"
 8267:             "~n   Config:             ~p", [N, AgentPreTransports, Config]),
 8268: 
 8269:     %% --
 8270:     %% Start nodes
 8271:     %%
 8272: 
 8273:     {ok, AgentPeer, AgentNode} = ?START_PEER("-agent"),
 8274:     {ok, ManagerPeer, ManagerNode} = ?START_PEER("-manager"),
 8275: 
 8276:     %% --
 8277:     %% Misc
 8278:     %%
 8279: 
 8280:     AgentHost         = ?HOSTNAME(AgentNode),
 8281:     ManagerHost       = ?HOSTNAME(ManagerNode),
 8282: 
 8283:     ?IPRINT("otp16649_init -> "
 8284:             "~n      AgentHost:   ~p"
 8285:             "~n      ManagerHost: ~p",
 8286:             [AgentHost, ManagerHost]),
 8287: 
 8288:     Host              = snmp_test_lib:hostname(), 
 8289:     Ip                = ?config(ip, Config),
 8290:     %% We should really "extract" the address from the hostnames,
 8291:     %% but because on some OSes (Ubuntu) adds 12.7.0.1.1 to its hosts file,
 8292:     %% this does not work. We want a "proper" address.
 8293:     %% Also, since both nodes (agent and manager) are both started locally,
 8294:     %% we can use 'Ip' for both!
 8295:     %% {ok, AgentIP}     = snmp_misc:ip(AgentHost),
 8296:     %% {ok, ManagerIP0}  = snmp_misc:ip(ManagerHost),
 8297:     AgentIP           = Ip,
 8298:     ManagerIP0        = Ip,
 8299:     ManagerIP         = tuple_to_list(ManagerIP0),
 8300:     ?IPRINT("otp16649_init -> "
 8301:             "~n      Host:       ~p"
 8302:             "~n      Ip:         ~p"
 8303:             "~n      AgentIP:    ~p"
 8304:             "~n      ManagerIP0: ~p"
 8305:             "~n      ManagerIP:  ~p",
 8306:             [Host, Ip, AgentIP, ManagerIP0, ManagerIP]),
 8307: 
 8308: 
 8309:     %% --
 8310:     %% Write agent config
 8311:     %% 
 8312: 
 8313:     AgentConfDir        = ?config(agent_conf_dir, Config),
 8314:     Vsns                = [v1,v2],
 8315:     TransportDomain     = ?config(tdomain, Config),
 8316:     F = fun({PortInfo, Kind}) ->
 8317:                 #{addr => {AgentIP, PortInfo}, kind => Kind};
 8318:            ({PortInfo, Kind, Opts}) ->
 8319:                 #{addr => {AgentIP, PortInfo}, kind => Kind, opts => Opts}
 8320:         end,
 8321:     AgentPreTransports2 = [F(T) || T <- AgentPreTransports],
 8322: 
 8323:     ?IPRINT("write agent config files"),
 8324:     ok = snmp_config:write_agent_snmp_files(
 8325:                  AgentConfDir, Vsns,
 8326:                  TransportDomain, {ManagerIP, ?MGR_PORT}, AgentPreTransports2,
 8327:                  "test"),
 8328: 
 8329:     ?IPRINT("start agent"),
 8330:     Config2 = start_agent([{host,          Host},
 8331: 			   {agent_peer,    AgentPeer},
 8332: 			   {agent_node,    AgentNode},
 8333: 			   {agent_host,    AgentHost},
 8334: 			   {agent_ip,      AgentIP},
 8335: 			   {manager_peer,  ManagerPeer},
 8336: 			   {manager_node,  ManagerNode},
 8337: 			   {manager_host,  ManagerHost},
 8338: 			   {manager_ip,    ManagerIP}|Config]),
 8339: 
 8340: 
 8341: 
 8342:     %% --
 8343:     %% Write manager config
 8344:     %%
 8345: 
 8346:     ?IPRINT("create manager dirs"),
 8347:     MgrTopDir  = ?config(manager_top_dir, Config),
 8348:     MgrDbDir   = filename:join(MgrTopDir,  "db/"),
 8349:     MgrConfDir = filename:join(MgrTopDir,  "conf/"),
 8350:     ok   = file:make_dir(MgrConfDir),
 8351:     MgrDbDir   = filename:join(MgrTopDir,  "db/"),
 8352:     ok   = file:make_dir(MgrDbDir),
 8353:     MgrLogDir  = filename:join(MgrTopDir,  "log/"),
 8354:     ok   = file:make_dir(MgrLogDir),
 8355: 
 8356:     ?IPRINT("write manager config files"),
 8357:     MgrTransports = [{TransportDomain, {ManagerIP0, ?MGR_PORT}}],
 8358:     ok = snmp_config:write_manager_snmp_files(
 8359:                  MgrConfDir,
 8360:                  MgrTransports,
 8361:                  ?MGR_MMS, ?MGR_ENGINE_ID),
 8362:     
 8363:     Config3 = [{manager_db_dir,   MgrDbDir},
 8364:                {manager_conf_dir, MgrConfDir},
 8365:                {manager_log_dir,  MgrLogDir} | Config2],
 8366:                
 8367:     ?IPRINT("start manager"),
 8368:     ok = start_manager(Config3),
 8369: 
 8370:     ?DBG("otp16649_init -> done when"
 8371:          "~n   Config2: ~p", [Config3]),
 8372:     [{agent_raw_transports, AgentPreTransports} | Config3].
 8373: 
 8374: 
 8375: otp16649_fin(N, Config) when is_integer(N) ->
 8376:     ?IPRINT("otp16649_fin -> entry with"
 8377:             "~n   N:      ~p"
 8378:             "~n   Config: ~p", [N, Config]),
 8379: 
 8380:     ManagerNode = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 8381: 
 8382:     %% -
 8383:     %% Stop agent (this is the nice way to do it, 
 8384:     %% so logs and files can be closed in the proper way).
 8385:     %%
 8386: 
 8387:     AgentTopSup = ?config(agent_sup, Config),
 8388:     stop_standalone_agent(AgentTopSup),
 8389: 
 8390: 
 8391:     %% -
 8392:     %% Stop manager
 8393:     %%
 8394: 
 8395:     stop_standalone_manager(ManagerNode),
 8396: 
 8397: 
 8398:     %%
 8399:     %% Stop the manager node
 8400:     %%
 8401: 
 8402:     ?DBG("otp16649_fin -> stop manager node", []),
 8403:     peer:stop(?config(manager_peer, Config)),
 8404: 
 8405: 
 8406:     %%
 8407:     %% Stop the agent node
 8408:     %%
 8409: 
 8410:     ?DBG("otp16649_fin -> stop agent node", []),
 8411:     peer:stop(?config(agent_peer, Config)),
 8412: 
 8413:     ?DBG("otp16649_fin -> done", []),
 8414:     Config1 = lists:keydelete(manager_node, 1, Config),
 8415:     lists:keydelete(agent_node, 1, Config1).
 8416: 
 8417: 
 8418: otp16649_validate_transports([], []) ->
 8419:     ok;
 8420: otp16649_validate_transports([AgentRawTransport|AgentRawTransports],
 8421:                              [TI|TIs]) ->
 8422:     ?IPRINT("validate transport:"
 8423:             "~n   AgentRawTransport: ~p"
 8424:             "~n   TI:                ~p",  [AgentRawTransport, TI]),
 8425:     otp16649_validate_transport(AgentRawTransport, TI),
 8426:     otp16649_validate_transports(AgentRawTransports, TIs).
 8427: 
 8428: otp16649_validate_transport({PortInfo, Kind}, #{taddress       := {_, PortNo},
 8429:                                                 transport_kind := Kind}) ->
 8430:     ?IPRINT("validate ~w transport:"
 8431:             "~n   PortNo:   ~w"
 8432:             "~n   PortInfo: ~p",  [Kind, PortNo, PortInfo]),
 8433:     otp16649_validate_port(PortInfo, PortNo);
 8434: otp16649_validate_transport({_, ConfKind}, #{taddress       := {_, PortNo},
 8435:                                              transport_kind := ActualKind}) ->
 8436:     exit({invalid_transport_kind, {PortNo, ConfKind, ActualKind}});
 8437: otp16649_validate_transport({PortInfo, Kind, _}, #{taddress       := {_, PortNo},
 8438:                                                    transport_kind := Kind}) ->
 8439:     ?IPRINT("validate ~w transport:"
 8440:             "~n   PortNo:   ~w"
 8441:             "~n   PortInfo: ~p",  [Kind, PortNo, PortInfo]),
 8442:     otp16649_validate_port(PortInfo, PortNo);
 8443: otp16649_validate_transport({_, ConfKind, _}, #{taddress       := {_, PortNo},
 8444:                                                 transport_kind := ActualKind}) ->
 8445:     exit({invalid_transport_kind, {PortNo, ConfKind, ActualKind}}).
 8446: 
 8447: otp16649_validate_port(PortNo, PortNo) when is_integer(PortNo) ->
 8448:     ok;
 8449: otp16649_validate_port(0, PortNo) when is_integer(PortNo) ->
 8450:     ok;
 8451: otp16649_validate_port(system, PortNo) when is_integer(PortNo) ->
 8452:     ok;
 8453: otp16649_validate_port(Range, PortNo) when is_tuple(Range) ->
 8454:     case otp16649_validate_port_range(Range, PortNo) of
 8455:         ok ->
 8456:             ok;
 8457:         error ->
 8458:             exit({invalid_transport_port_no, {Range, PortNo}})
 8459:     end;
 8460: otp16649_validate_port(Ranges, PortNo) when is_list(Ranges) ->
 8461:     case otp16649_validate_port_ranges(Ranges, PortNo) of
 8462:         ok ->
 8463:             ok;
 8464:         error ->
 8465:             exit({invalid_transport_port_no, {Ranges, PortNo}})
 8466:     end.
 8467: 
 8468: 
 8469: otp16649_validate_port_range({Min, Max}, PortNo)
 8470:   when is_integer(Min) andalso
 8471:        is_integer(Max) andalso
 8472:        is_integer(PortNo) andalso
 8473:        (Min =< PortNo) andalso
 8474:        (PortNo =< Max) ->
 8475:     ok;
 8476: otp16649_validate_port_range(_Range, _PortNo) ->
 8477:     error.
 8478: 
 8479: otp16649_validate_port_ranges([], _PortNo) ->
 8480:     error;
 8481: otp16649_validate_port_ranges([PortNo|_], PortNo) when is_integer(PortNo) ->
 8482:     ok;
 8483: otp16649_validate_port_ranges([Range|Ranges], PortNo) when is_tuple(Range) ->
 8484:     case otp16649_validate_port_range(Range, PortNo) of
 8485:         ok ->
 8486:             ok;
 8487:         error ->
 8488:             otp16649_validate_port_ranges(Ranges, PortNo)
 8489:     end;
 8490: otp16649_validate_port_ranges([_|Ranges], PortNo) ->
 8491:     otp16649_validate_port_ranges(Ranges, PortNo).
 8492: 
 8493: 
 8494: otp16649_which_req_port_no(TIs) ->
 8495:     ?IPRINT("otp16649_which_req_port_no -> entry with"
 8496:             "~n      TIs: ~p", [TIs]),
 8497:     otp16649_which_port_no(TIs, req_responder).
 8498: 
 8499: otp16649_which_trap_port_no(TIs) ->
 8500:     ?IPRINT("otp16649_which_trap_port_no -> entry with"
 8501:             "~n      TIs: ~p", [TIs]),
 8502:     otp16649_which_port_no(TIs, trap_sender).
 8503: 
 8504: otp16649_which_port_no([], Kind) ->
 8505:     exit({no_transport_port_no, Kind});
 8506: otp16649_which_port_no([#{taddress       := {_, PortNo},
 8507:                           transport_kind := Kind}|_], Kind) ->
 8508:     PortNo;
 8509: otp16649_which_port_no([_|TIs], Kind) ->
 8510:     otp16649_which_port_no(TIs, Kind).
 8511:

 8517: otp16649_mgr_reg_agent(Node, IPFam, TDomain, Target, PortNo) ->
 8518:     ?IPRINT("otp16649_mgr_reg_agent -> entry with"
 8519:             "~n      Node:    ~p"
 8520:             "~n      IPFam:   ~p"
 8521:             "~n      TDomain: ~p"
 8522:             "~n      Target:  ~p"
 8523:             "~n      PortNo:  ~p",
 8524:             [Node, IPFam, TDomain, Target, PortNo]),
 8525:     Localhost = ?LOCALHOST(IPFam),
 8526:     Version   = v1,
 8527:     EngineId  = "agentEngine",
 8528:     ?IPRINT("otp16649_mgr_reg_agent -> register agent:"
 8529:             "~n      Target:   ~p"
 8530:             "~n      Address:  ~p"
 8531:             "~n      Port:     ~p"
 8532:             "~n      Version:  ~p"
 8533:             "~n      TDomain:  ~p"
 8534:             "~n      EngineId: ~p",
 8535:             [Target, Localhost, PortNo, Version, TDomain, EngineId]),    
 8536:     Config     = [{address,   Localhost},
 8537:                   {port,      PortNo},
 8538:                   {version,   Version},
 8539:                   {tdomain,   TDomain},
 8540:                   {engine_id, EngineId}],
 8541:     rpc:call(Node, snmpm, register_agent,
 8542:               [otp16649, Target, Config]).

 8594: start_agent(Config, Opts) ->
 8595: 
 8596:     %% Directories
 8597:     ConfDir     = ?config(agent_conf_dir,     Config),
 8598:     DbDir       = ?config(agent_db_dir,       Config),
 8599:     LogDir      = ?config(agent_log_dir,      Config),
 8600:     InetBackend = ?config(socket_create_opts, Config),
 8601:  
 8602:     Vsns = [v1], 
 8603: 
 8604:     AgentConfig = process_agent_options(ConfDir, DbDir, LogDir, Vsns,
 8605:                                         InetBackend, Opts),
 8606:     
 8607:     %% Nodes
 8608:     AgentNode = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 8609:     
 8610:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 8611: 
 8612:     {ok, AgentTopSup} = start_standalone_agent(AgentNode, AgentConfig),
 8613: 
 8614:     [{agent_sup, AgentTopSup} | Config].
 8615:     
 8616: 
 8617: process_agent_options(ConfDir, DbDir, LogDir, Vsns, InetBackend, Opts) ->
 8618:     ?IPRINT("process_agent_options ->"
 8619:             "~n   ConfDir:     ~p"
 8620:             "~n   DbDir:       ~p"
 8621:             "~n   LogDir:      ~p"
 8622:             "~n   Vsns:        ~p"
 8623:             "~n   InetBackend: ~p"
 8624:             "~n   Opts:        ~p",
 8625:             [ConfDir, DbDir, LogDir, Vsns, InetBackend, Opts]),
 8626:     Defaults = 
 8627: 	[{agent_type,      master},
 8628: 	 {agent_verbosity, trace},
 8629: 	 {priority,        normal},
 8630: 	 {versions,        Vsns},
 8631: 	 {db_dir,          DbDir},
 8632: 	 {mib_storage,     ets},
 8633: 	 {local_db, [{repair,    true},
 8634: 		     {auto_save, 5000},
 8635: 		     {verbosity, log}]},
 8636: 	 {error_report_module, snmpa_error_logger},
 8637: 	 {config, [{dir,        ConfDir},
 8638: 		   {force_load, true},
 8639: 		   {verbosity,  trace}]},
 8640: 	 {multi_threaded, true},
 8641: 	 {mib_server, [{mibentry_override,  false},
 8642: 		       {trapentry_override, false},
 8643: 		       {verbosity,          info}]},
 8644: 	 {target_cache,   [{verbosity,info}]},
 8645: 	 {symbolic_store, [{verbosity,log}]},
 8646: 	 {note_store, [{timeout,30000}, {verbosity,log}]},
 8647: 	 {net_if, [{module,    snmpa_net_if},
 8648: 		   {verbosity, trace},
 8649: 		   {options,   InetBackend ++ [{bind_to,   false},
 8650:                                                {no_reuse,  false},
 8651:                                                {req_limit, infinity}]}]},
 8652: 	 {audit_trail_log, [{type,   read_write},
 8653: 			    {dir,    LogDir},
 8654: 			    {size,   {10240,20}},
 8655: 			    {repair, true},
 8656: 			    {seqno,  true}]}],
 8657:     
 8658:     process_options(Defaults, Opts).
 8659: 
 8660: process_options(Defaults, _Opts) ->
 8661:     %% process_options(Defaults, Opts, []).
 8662:     Defaults.
 8663: 
 8664: 
 8665: start_standalone_agent(Node, Config)  ->
 8666:     case rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, start_standalone_agent, [Config]) of
 8667:         {ok, _} = OK ->
 8668: 	    ?IPRINT("~w -> agent started", [?FUNCTION_NAME]),
 8669:             OK;
 8670:         {error, {net_if, error, {What, Info, Reason} = Details}} ->
 8671: 	    ?EPRINT("~w -> failed start agent - net-if: "
 8672:                     "~n   What:   ~p"
 8673:                     "~n   Info:   ~p"
 8674:                     "~n   Reason: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, What, Info, Reason]),
 8675: 	    ?FAIL({start_failed, net_if, Details});            
 8676:         {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8677:             ERROR;
 8678: 
 8679:         {badrpc, _Reason} = BADRPC ->
 8680:             BADRPC
 8681:     end.
 8682: 
 8683: start_standalone_agent(Config)  ->
 8684:     case snmpa_supervisor:start_link(normal, Config) of
 8685:         {ok, AgentTopSup} ->
 8686:             unlink(AgentTopSup),
 8687:             {ok, AgentTopSup};
 8688:         {error, {already_started, AgentTopSup}} ->
 8689:             {ok, AgentTopSup};
 8690:         %% {error, {net_if, error, {What, Info, Reason} = Details}} ->
 8691: 	%%     ?EPRINT("~w -> failed start agent - net-if: "
 8692:         %%             "~n   What:   ~p"
 8693:         %%             "~n   Info:   ~p"
 8694:         %%             "~n   Reason: ~p", [?FUNCTION_NAME, What, Info, Reason]),
 8695: 	%%     ?FAIL({start_failed, net_if, Details});            
 8696:         {error, _} = ERROR ->
 8697:             ERROR
 8698:     end.
 8699: 
 8700: stop_standalone_agent(Pid) when (node(Pid) =/= node()) ->
 8701:     MRef = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
 8702:     rpc:call(node(Pid), ?MODULE, stop_standalone_agent, [Pid]),
 8703:     receive
 8704: 	{'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, _Info} ->
 8705: 	    ?DBG("received expected DOWN message "
 8706: 		 "regarding snmp agent supervisor: "
 8707: 		 "~n   Info: ~p", [_Info]),
 8708: 	    ok
 8709:     after 5000 ->
 8710: 	    ?DBG("no DOWN message "
 8711: 		 "regarding snmp agent supervisor within time", []),
 8712: 	    ok
 8713:     end;
 8714: stop_standalone_agent(Pid) ->
 8715:     ?DBG("attempting to terminate agent top-supervisor: ~p", [Pid]),
 8716:     nkill(Pid, kill).
 8717: 
 8718: 
 8719: start_manager(Config) ->
 8720:     Node    = ?config(manager_node, Config),
 8721:     ConfDir = ?config(manager_conf_dir, Config),
 8722:     DbDir   = ?config(manager_db_dir, Config),
 8723: 
 8724:     Opts = [{server, [{verbosity, trace}]},
 8725: 	    {net_if, [{verbosity, trace}]},
 8726: 	    {note_store, [{verbosity, trace}]},
 8727: 	    {config, [{verbosity, trace}, {dir, ConfDir}, {db_dir, DbDir}]}],
 8728:     ok = start_standalone_manager(Node, Opts).
 8729: 
 8730: 
 8731: start_standalone_manager(Node, Config) ->
 8732:     rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, start_standalone_manager, [Config]).
 8733: 
 8734: start_standalone_manager(Config)  ->
 8735:     snmpm:start(Config).
 8736: 
 8737: 
 8738: stop_standalone_manager(Node) when (Node =/= node()) ->
 8739:     rpc:call(Node, snmpm, stop, []);
 8740: stop_standalone_manager(_) ->
 8741:     snmpm:stop().
 8742: 
 8743: 
 8744: nkill(Pid, Reason) ->
 8745:     nkill(Pid, Reason, 10).
 8746: 
 8747: nkill(Pid, Reason, N) when N > 0 ->
 8748:     case (catch erlang:process_info(Pid)) of
 8749: 	Info when is_list(Info) ->
 8750: 	    ?DBG("Info for process to kill: "
 8751: 		 "~n   Info: ~p", [Info]),
 8752: 	    exit(Pid, Reason),
 8753: 	    ?SLEEP(1000),
 8754: 	    nkill(Pid, Reason, N-1);
 8755: 	_ ->
 8756: 	    ?DBG("No process info => already dead?", []),
 8757: 	    ok
 8758:     end.
 8759:

 8764: 
 8765: info_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 8766:     ?P(info_test), 
 8767:     init_case(Config),
 8768: 
 8769:     load_master("OLD-SNMPEA-MIB"),
 8770:     init_old(),
 8771:     try_test(do_info, [node()]),
 8772:     unload_master("OLD-SNMPEA-MIB").
 8773:     
 8774: do_info(MaNode) ->
 8775:     Info = rpc:call(MaNode, snmpa, info, []),
 8776:     ?DBG("info_test1 -> Info: ~n~p", [Info]),
 8777:     Keys = [vsns, 
 8778: 	    stats_counters, 
 8779: 	    {agent, [process_memory, db_memory]}, 
 8780: 	    {net_if, [process_memory, transport_info, reqs]}, 
 8781: 	    {note_store, [process_memory, db_memory]}, 
 8782: 	    {symbolic_store, [process_memory, db_memory]}, 
 8783: 	    {local_db, [process_memory, db_memory]}, 
 8784: 	    {mib_server, [process_memory, 
 8785: 			  loaded_mibs, 
 8786: 			  subagents, 
 8787: 			  tree_size_bytes, 
 8788: 			  db_memory]}], 
 8789:     verify_info(Info, Keys),
 8790:     ok.
 8791: 
 8792: verify_info([], []) ->
 8793:     ok;
 8794: verify_info([], Keys) ->
 8795:     ?FAIL({remaining_info_keys, Keys});
 8796: verify_info(Info0, [Key|Keys]) ->
 8797:     Info = verify_info1(Info0, Key),
 8798:     verify_info(Info, Keys).
 8799: 
 8800: verify_info1(Info0, Key) when is_atom(Key) ->
 8801:     case lists:keydelete(Key, 1, Info0) of
 8802: 	Info0 ->
 8803: 	    ?FAIL({missing_info, Key});
 8804: 	Info ->
 8805: 	    Info
 8806:     end;
 8807: verify_info1(Info0, {Key, SubKeys}) when is_atom(Key) andalso is_list(SubKeys) ->
 8808:     case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Info0) of
 8809: 	false ->
 8810: 	    ?FAIL({missing_info, Key});	    
 8811: 	{value, {Key, SubInfo}} ->
 8812: 	    case verify_subinfo(SubInfo, SubKeys) of
 8813: 		ok ->
 8814: 		    lists:keydelete(Key, 1, Info0);
 8815: 		{error, MissingSubKeyOrKeys} ->
 8816: 		    ?FAIL({missing_info, {Key, MissingSubKeyOrKeys}})
 8817: 	    end
 8818:     end.
 8819: 
 8820: verify_subinfo(_, []) ->
 8821:     ok;
 8822: verify_subinfo([], Keys) ->
 8823:     {error, Keys};
 8824: verify_subinfo(Info0, [Key|Keys]) ->
 8825:     case lists:keydelete(Key, 1, Info0) of
 8826: 	Info0 ->
 8827: 	    {error, Key};
 8828: 	Info ->
 8829: 	    verify_subinfo(Info, Keys)
 8830:     end.
 8831:    
 8832: %% Index String - string used in index
 8833: is(S) -> [length(S) | S].
 8834:

 8925: display_log(Config) ->
 8926:     case lists:keysearch(agent_log_dir, 1, Config) of
 8927: 	{value, {_, Dir}} ->
 8928: 	    case lists:keysearch(snmp_master, 1, Config) of
 8929: 		{value, {_, Node}} ->
 8930: 		    LogDir  = Dir, 
 8931: 		    Mibs    = [], 
 8932: 		    OutFile = join(LogDir, "snmpa_log.txt"), 
 8933: 		    ?IPRINT("~n"
 8934:                             "========================="
 8935:                             "  < Audit Trail Log >  "
 8936:                             "========================="
 8937:                             "~n"),
 8938: 		    rcall(Node, snmpa, log_to_txt, [LogDir, Mibs, OutFile]),
 8939: 		    rcall(Node, snmpa, log_to_io, [LogDir, Mibs]),
 8940: 		    ?IPRINT("~n"
 8941:                             "========================="
 8942:                             " < / Audit Trail Log > "
 8943:                             "========================="
 8944:                             "~n");
 8945: 		false ->
 8946: 		    ?IPRINT("display_log -> no agent node found"),
 8947: 		    ok
 8948: 	    end;
 8949: 	false ->
 8950: 	    ?IPRINT("display_log -> no agent log dir found: "
 8951:                     "~n   ~p", [Config]),
 8952: 	    ok
 8953:     end.

 8957: 
 8958: display_memory_usage() ->
 8959:     Info  = snmpa:info(snmp_master_agent),
 8960:     AMU   = display_agent_memory_usage(Info),
 8961:     NIMU  = display_net_if_memory_usage(Info),
 8962:     NSMU  = display_note_store_memory_usage(Info),
 8963:     SSMU  = display_symbolic_store_memory_usage(Info),
 8964:     LDBMU = display_local_db_memory_usage(Info),
 8965:     MSMU  = display_mib_server_memory_usage(Info),
 8966:     ?NPRINT("Memory usage: ~n" ++ AMU ++ NIMU ++ NSMU ++ SSMU ++ LDBMU ++ MSMU),
 8967:     ok.
 8968: 
 8969: display_agent_memory_usage(Info) ->
 8970:     AgentInfo = lists_key1search(agent, Info),
 8971:     ProcMem   = 
 8972: 	lists_key1search([process_memory,master_agent], AgentInfo),
 8973:     WProcMem  = 
 8974: 	lists_key1search([process_memory,worker], AgentInfo),
 8975:     SWProcMem = 
 8976: 	lists_key1search([process_memory,set_worker], AgentInfo),
 8977:     TabSize  = 
 8978: 	lists_key1search([db_memory,agent], AgentInfo),
 8979:     CCSize   = 
 8980: 	lists_key1search([db_memory,community_cache], AgentInfo),
 8981:     VacmSize = 
 8982: 	lists_key1search([db_memory,vacm], AgentInfo),
 8983:     ?F("  Agent memory usage: "
 8984:        "~n    Master process memory size:     ~p"
 8985:        "~n    Worker process memory size:     ~p"
 8986:        "~n    Set-worker process memory size: ~p"
 8987:        "~n    Agent tab size:                 ~p"
 8988:        "~n    Community cache size:           ~p"
 8989:        "~n    Vacm tab size:                  ~p"
 8990:        "~n",
 8991:        [ProcMem, WProcMem, SWProcMem, 
 8992:         TabSize, CCSize, VacmSize]).
 8993: 
 8994: display_net_if_memory_usage(Info) ->
 8995:     NiInfo     = lists_key1search(net_if, Info),
 8996:     ProcMem    = lists_key1search(process_memory, NiInfo),
 8997:     ?F("  Net if memory usage: "
 8998:        "~n    Process memory size:            ~p"
 8999:        "~n", [ProcMem]).
 9000: 
 9001: display_note_store_memory_usage(Info) ->
 9002:     NsInfo     = lists_key1search(note_store, Info),
 9003:     ProcMem    = lists_key1search([process_memory,notes], NsInfo),
 9004:     ProcTmrMem = lists_key1search([process_memory,timer], NsInfo),
 9005:     TabSize    = lists_key1search([db_memory,notes],      NsInfo),
 9006:     ?F("  Note store memory usage: "
 9007:        "~n    Notes process memory size:      ~p"
 9008:        "~n    Timer process memory size:      ~p"
 9009:        "~n    Notes tab size:                 ~p"
 9010:        "~n",
 9011:        [ProcMem, ProcTmrMem, TabSize]).
 9012:  
 9013:   display_symbolic_store_memory_usage(Info) -> 
 9014:     SsInfo  = lists_key1search(symbolic_store, Info),
 9015:     ProcMem = lists_key1search(process_memory, SsInfo),
 9016:     DbMem   = lists_key1search(db_memory,      SsInfo),
 9017:     ?F("  Symbolic store memory usage: "
 9018:        "~n    Process memory size:            ~p"
 9019:        "~n    DB size:                        ~p"
 9020:        "~n",
 9021:        [ProcMem, DbMem]).
 9022:     
 9023: display_local_db_memory_usage(Info) ->
 9024:     LdInfo   = lists_key1search(local_db, Info),
 9025:     ProcMem  = lists_key1search(process_memory,   LdInfo),
 9026:     EtsSize  = lists_key1search([db_memory,ets],  LdInfo),
 9027:     DetsSize = lists_key1search([db_memory,dets], LdInfo),
 9028:     ?F("  Local DB memory usage: "
 9029:        "~n    Process memory size:            ~p"
 9030:        "~n    DB [ets] size:                  ~p"
 9031:        "~n    DB [dets] size:                 ~p"
 9032:        "~n",
 9033:        [ProcMem, EtsSize, DetsSize]).
 9034: 
 9035: display_mib_server_memory_usage(Info) ->
 9036:     MibInfo    = lists_key1search(mib_server, Info),
 9037:     ProcMem    = lists_key1search(process_memory,   MibInfo),
 9038:     TreeSize   = lists_key1search(tree_size_bytes,  MibInfo),
 9039:     MibDbSize  = lists_key1search([db_memory,mib],  MibInfo),
 9040:     NodeDbSize = lists_key1search([db_memory,node], MibInfo),
 9041:     TreeDbSize = lists_key1search([db_memory,tree], MibInfo),
 9042:     ?F("  MIB server memory usage: "
 9043:        "~n    Process memory size:            ~p"
 9044:        "~n    Tree size:                      ~p"
 9045:        "~n    Mib db size:                    ~p"
 9046:        "~n    Node db size:                   ~p"
 9047:        "~n    Tree db size:                   ~p"
 9048:        "~n", 
 9049:        [ProcMem, TreeSize, MibDbSize, NodeDbSize, TreeDbSize]).
 9050:     
 9051: lists_key1search([], Res) ->
 9052:     Res;
 9053: lists_key1search([Key|Keys], List) when is_atom(Key) andalso is_list(List) ->
 9054:     case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, List) of
 9055: 	{value, {Key, Val}} ->
 9056: 	    lists_key1search(Keys, Val);
 9057: 	false ->
 9058: 	    undefined
 9059:     end;
 9060: lists_key1search(Key, List) when is_atom(Key) ->
 9061:     case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, List) of
 9062: 	{value, {Key, Val}} ->
 9063: 	    Val;
 9064: 	false ->
 9065: 	    undefined
 9066:     end.
 9067: 
 9068: 
 9069: %% ------
 9070: 
 9071: init_v1_agent(Config) -> 
 9072:     %% -- 
 9073:     %% Start nodes
 9074:     %%
 9075:     {ok, AgentPeer, AgentNode} = ?START_PEER("-agent"),
 9076: 
 9077:     %% We don't use a manager in this test but the (common) config 
 9078:     %% function takes an argument that is derived from this
 9079:     {ok, ManagerPeer, ManagerNode} = ?START_PEER("-manager"),
 9080: 
 9081:     %% -- 
 9082:     %% Mnesia init
 9083:     %% 
 9084: 
 9085:     AgentDbDir = ?config(agent_db_dir, Config),
 9086:     AgentMnesiaDir = join([AgentDbDir, "mnesia"]),
 9087:     mnesia_init(AgentNode, AgentMnesiaDir),
 9088: 
 9089:     mnesia_create_schema(AgentNode, [AgentNode]),
 9090: 
 9091:     mnesia_start(AgentNode),
 9092: 
 9093:     %% --
 9094:     %% Host & IP
 9095:     %% 
 9096: 
 9097:     AgentHost   = ?HOSTNAME(AgentNode),
 9098:     ManagerHost = ?HOSTNAME(ManagerNode),
 9099: 
 9100:     Host              = snmp_test_lib:hostname(), 
 9101:     IpFamily          = config_ipfamily(Config),
 9102:     Ip                = ?LOCALHOST(IpFamily),
 9103:     {ok, AgentIP0}    = snmp_misc:ip(AgentHost, IpFamily),
 9104:     AgentIP           = tuple_to_list(AgentIP0), 
 9105:     {ok, ManagerIP0}  = snmp_misc:ip(ManagerHost, IpFamily),
 9106:     ManagerIP         = tuple_to_list(ManagerIP0),
 9107: 
 9108: 
 9109:     %% --
 9110:     %% Write agent config
 9111:     %% 
 9112: 
 9113:     Vsns           = [v1], 
 9114:     ManagerConfDir = ?config(manager_top_dir, Config),
 9115:     AgentConfDir   = ?config(agent_conf_dir, Config),
 9116:     AgentTopDir    = ?config(agent_top_dir, Config),
 9117:     AgentBkpDir1   = join([AgentTopDir, backup1]),
 9118:     AgentBkpDir2   = join([AgentTopDir, backup2]),
 9119:     ok = file:make_dir(AgentBkpDir1),
 9120:     ok = file:make_dir(AgentBkpDir2),
 9121:     AgentBkpDirs = [AgentBkpDir1, AgentBkpDir2], 
 9122:     config(Vsns, ManagerConfDir, AgentConfDir, ManagerIP, AgentIP, IpFamily),
 9123: 
 9124: 
 9125:     %% --
 9126:     %% Start the agent
 9127:     %% 
 9128: 
 9129:     Config2 = start_agent([{host,              Host}, 
 9130: 			   {ip,                Ip},
 9131: 			   {agent_peer,        AgentPeer},
 9132: 			   {agent_node,        AgentNode}, 
 9133: 			   {agent_host,        AgentHost}, 
 9134: 			   {agent_ip,          AgentIP}, 
 9135: 			   {agent_backup_dirs, AgentBkpDirs},
 9136:                            
 9137:                            %% We need this here since without it
 9138:                            %% fin_v1_agent will not be able to stop!
 9139:                            {manager_peer, ManagerPeer},
 9140:                            {manager_node, ManagerNode}|Config]),
 9141: 
 9142:     %% -- 
 9143:     %% Create watchdog 
 9144:     %% 
 9145: 
 9146:     wd_start(1, Config2).
 9147: 
 9148: fin_v1_agent(Config) ->
 9149:     AgentNode   = ?config(agent_node, Config),
 9150: 
 9151:     %% -
 9152:     %% Stop agent (this is the nice way to do it, 
 9153:     %% so logs and files can be closed in the proper way).
 9154:     %% 
 9155: 
 9156:     AgentSup = ?config(agent_sup, Config),
 9157:     stop_standalone_agent(AgentSup), 
 9158: 
 9159:     %% - 
 9160:     %% Stop mnesia
 9161:     %% 
 9162:     mnesia_stop(AgentNode),
 9163: 
 9164: 
 9165:     %% - 
 9166:     %% Stop the agent node
 9167:     %%
 9168:     peer:stop(?config(agent_peer, Config)),
 9169: 
 9170: 
 9171:     %%     SubAgentNode = ?config(sub_agent_node, Config),
 9172:     %%     stop_node(SubAgentNode),
 9173: 
 9174: 
 9175:     %% - 
 9176:     %% Stop the manager node
 9177:     %% 
 9178:     peer:stop(?config(manager_peer, Config)),
 9179: 
 9180:     wd_stop(Config).
 9181: 
 9182: 
 9183: config_ipfamily(Config) ->
 9184:     case ?config(ipfamily, Config) of
 9185: 	undefined ->
 9186: 	    inet;
 9187: 	Value ->
 9188: 	    Value
 9189:     end.
 9190: 
 9191: 
 9192: %% ------
 9193: 
 9194: join(Parts) ->
 9195:     filename:join(Parts).
 9196: 
 9197: join(Dir, File) ->
 9198:     filename:join(Dir, File).
 9199: 
 9200: 
 9201: %% ------
 9202: 
 9203: rcall(Node, Mod, Func, Args) ->
 9204:     case rpc:call(Node, Mod, Func, Args) of
 9205: 	{badrpc, nodedown} ->
 9206: 	    ?FAIL({rpc_failure, Node});
 9207: 	Else ->
 9208: 	    Else
 9209:     end.
